text: Mountrath Community School () is the only secondary school in Mountrath, County Laois in Ireland. It is an amalgamation of three former secondary schools (namely the Bridgidine Convent, St Aengus Vocational School, and Patrician College) all of which closed in 2009 and reopened as a combined school in September 2009. The Patrician Brothers and Le Chéile Trust, the Brigidine Sisters and the Laois Vocational Education Committee are the trustees of the community school. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Education in County Laois Category:Community schools in the Republic of Ireland
title: Mountrath Community School
